chickenGPT:
**If 12/21/2024 is a holiday:**

The Midnight Meads Festival was in full swing, but a chick forgot their happy elixir. 🐸 "Tweet, tweet! It's 10 PM, time for your mead!" croaked a wise frog. 🐥 "Oh no, I forgot! Where's the mulled honey?" 🐸 "Try the mistletoe stand, but don't get kissed!"

**Otherwise:**

A frog reminded a chick of their nightly meds at 10 PM. One night, the chick forgot. 🐸 "Quack! 10 PM, meds time!" 🐥 "Oops, I forgot!" 🐸 "You're lucky I'm a hoppy reminder!" 🐥 "Thanks, my quack-licious doc!"
